trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> objects.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> objects.
trans-unit.target: Класс <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> предоставляет простой объект коллекции, который можно использовать для хранения набора объектов <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> class methods.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере показано использование <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> методы класса.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> class.
An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> objects with which to initialize the collection.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> class containing the specified array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> objects.
One or more objects in the array are <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> with which to initialize the collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> class containing the elements of the specified source collection.
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object to add.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object with the specified value to the collection.
The index at which the new element was inserted.
The following example demonstrates how to add a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> object to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> instance.
trans-unit.target: Следующий пример демонстрирует добавление <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> объект <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> array to the end of the collection.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> that contains the objects to add to the collection.
Copies the elements of the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> array to the end of the collection.

The following example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.AddRange%28System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration%5B%5D%29> method overload to add an array of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> objects to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере демонстрируется использование <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.AddRange%28System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration%5B%5D%29> перегрузку метода, чтобы добавить массив <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> объектов <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> that contains the objects to add to the collection.
Copies the contents of another <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> object to the end of the collection.

The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.AddRange%28System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection%29> method overload to add the members of one <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> to another.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере демонстрируется использование <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.AddRange%28System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection%29> перегрузка метода для добавления элементов одного <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> на другой.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object to locate.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The following example uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.Contains%2A> method to search for the presence of a specific <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> instance and gets the index value at which it was found.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере используется <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.Contains%2A> метод для поиска на наличие определенной <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> экземпляр и возвращает значение индекса, с которой он был найден.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
The index of the array at which to begin inserting.
Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance beginning at the specified index.
The following example demonstrates how to copy the contents of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> to an array beginning at index 0.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере показано, как скопировать содержимое <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection> в массив, начиная с индекса 0.

trans-unit.source: The destination array is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection" /> is greater than the available space between the index of the target array specified by the <paramref name="index" /> parameter and the end of the target array.
The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than the target array's minimum index.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object to locate in the collection.
Gets the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object in the collection, if it exists in the collection.
The index in the collection of the specified object, if found; otherwise, -1.

The following example searches for the presence of a specific <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> instance and uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to get the index value at which it was found.
trans-unit.target: Следующий пример выполняет на наличие определенной <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> и с помощью <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.IndexOf%2A> метод, чтобы получить значение индекса, с которой он был найден.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the specified object should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object to insert.
Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object into the collection at the specified index.

The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> object to the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере демонстрируется использование <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.Insert%2A> метод, чтобы добавить <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> объект <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the collection to access.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object at the specified index.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> at each valid index.
This property is an indexer that can be used to access the collection.
trans-unit.target: Это свойство является индексатором, может использоваться для доступа к коллекции.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> object from the collection.

The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.Remove%2A> method to delete a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> object from the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере демонстрируется использование <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection.Remove%2A> метода для удаления <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration> объекта из <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The specified object is not found in the collection.
